<!--Hello-->
|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 난 아카데미아의 서기관 알하이탐이야. 문서를 조회하고 싶으면, 규정된 양식에 따라 작성한 신청서를 제출하면 돼. 아직 다 못 썼다고?<br />괜찮아. 내 업무 시간은 사무실 문밖에 붙여뒀으니까 다음 근무일에 다시 오면 돼
|vo_01_01_rm         = Nan Akademia-ui Seogigwan Alhaitamiya. Munseoreul johoehago sipeumyeon, gyujeongdoen yangsige ttara jakseonghan sincheongseoreul jechulhamyeon dwae. Ajik da mot sseottago?<br />Gwaenchana. Nae eommu siganeun samusil munbakke buchyeodwosseunikka daeum geunmuire dasi omyeon dwae
|vo_01_01_tl         = I am the Scribe of the Akademiya, Alhaitham. If you want to check a document, you just need to submit an application form written according to the regulation style. You still haven't finished writing?<br />It's okay. My working hours are attatched outside my office door, so you can come back at my next work day.

<!--Chats-->
|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・일
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Work
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Work.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 내가 서기관이 된 이유는 업무가 아주 간단하기 때문이야
|vo_02_01_rm         = Naega Seogigwani doen iyuneun eommuga aju gandanhagi ttaemuniya
|vo_02_01_tl         = The reason I became a Scribe is because the tasks are very simple.

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・독서
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Reading
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Reading.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 독서를 한다고 똑똑해지진 않지. 아카데미아 녀석들을 보면 알 수 있잖아?
|vo_02_02_rm         = Dokseoreul handago ttoktotkhaejijin anchi. Akademia nyeoseokdeureul bomyeon al su ijjana?
|vo_02_02_tl         = You don't become smart just because you read. You can know that from looking at the Akademiya guys, you know?

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・생각
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Thinking
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Thinking.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 음… 요즘 쓸데없는 신청서가 너무 많군. 전부 기각해야겠어
|vo_02_03_rm         = Eum... yojeun sseuldeeomneun sincheongseoga neomu mankun. Jeonbu gigakhaeyagesseo
|vo_02_03_tl         = Hmm... there are too many useless application forms these days. I should dismiss them all.

<!--Weather-->
|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…

|vo_03_01_rm         = Bi oneun nal oechureun jeongmal gwichana
|vo_03_01_tl         = Going outside on a rainy day is so troublesome.

|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 자연 현상일 뿐이니 무서워할 것 없어. 아, 큰 나무 아래에서 비를 피하는 게 아니라면 말이지
|vo_03_02_rm         = Jayeon hyeonsang'il ppunini museowohal geot eopsseo. A, keun namu araeeseo bireul pihaneun ge aniramyeon mariji
|vo_03_02_tl         = There is nothing to be scared of, since it's just a natural phenomenon. Ah, except when you are avoiding the rain below a big tree.

|vo_03_03_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg

|vo_03_03_rm         = Chupdago? Nan beotilmanhae
|vo_03_03_tl         = Feeling cold? I can hold out.

|vo_03_04_title      = 햇살이 좋을 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg

|vo_03_04_rm         = Oneulcheoreom hwachanghan nareneun amugeotto hago sipjji ankun
|vo_03_04_tl         = I don't want to do anything on a sunny day like today.

|vo_03_05_title      = 사막에 있을 때…
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = In the Desert
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} In the Desert.ogg

|vo_03_05_rm         = Ireon, sinbal ane moraega deureogasseo...
|vo_03_05_tl         = Oh, sand got into my shoes...

|vo_04_01_tx         = 아직 시간이 이른데, 가서 커피나 한잔해야겠어
|vo_04_01_rm         = Ajik sigani ireunde, gaseo keopina hanjanhaeyagesseo
|vo_04_01_tl         = The time is still early, I should go and have a cup of coffee.

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon

|vo_04_02_tx         = 볼일이 없으면, 방음 헤드폰을 끼고 눈 좀 붙일게
|vo_04_02_rm         = Boriri eopsseumyeon, bang'eum hedeuponeun kkigo nun jom buchilkke
|vo_04_02_tl         = If you have nothing to do with me, I'll sleep a bit with with my soundproof headphones on.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 지금부터는 개인 시간이야. 다음에 봐
|vo_04_03_rm         = Jigeumbuteoneun gaein siganiya. Daeume bwa
|vo_04_03_tl         = From now is personal time. See you next time.

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 룸메이트가 한밤중에 시끄럽게 모형을 만들지 않았으면 좋겠어…. 아니, 집에 없으면 더 좋겠군. 자면서까지 헤드폰을 끼고 싶진 않거든
|vo_04_04_rm         = Rummeiteuga hanbamjung'e sikkeureopkke mohyeong'eul mandeulji anasseumyeon jokesseo.... Ani, jibe eopsseumyeon deo jokekkun. Jamyeonseokkaji hedeuponeun kkigo sipjin ankeodeun
|vo_04_04_tl         = I hope my roommate doesn't make models loudly in the middle of the night... No, I would prefer if he were not at home. I don't want to wear headphones while sleeping.

<!--About-->
|vo_05_01_title      = 알하이탐 자신에 대해・사실
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Facts
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Facts.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 난 그럴듯한 수식어로 포장하는 것보단 사실만 말하는 걸 더 선호해
|vo_05_01_rm         = Nan geureoldeuthan susigeoro pojanghaneun geotbodan sasilman malhaneun geol deo seonhohae
|vo_05_01_tl         = I prefer telling the truth to exaggerating with plausible modifiers.

|vo_05_02_title      = 알하이탐 자신에 대해・소문
|vo_05_02_friendship = 4
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Rumors
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Rumors.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 음? 내 성격에 대한 소문을 들었고 신경 쓰인다고?<br />네가 어떻게 생각하든 내 알 바 아니야. 문제만 일으키지 않는다면 됐어
|vo_05_02_rm         = Eum? Nae seonggyeoge daehan somuneul deureokko singyeong sseuindago?<br />Nega eotteoke saenggakhadeun nae al ba aniya. Munjeman ireukiji anneundamyeon dwaesseo
|vo_05_02_tl         = Hmm? You heard the rumors about my personality and it's on your mind?<br />What you think is not my concern. It's alright if you don't cause any trouble.

<!--About Us-->
|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・인사
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Greetings
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Greetings.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 난 평소에 헤드폰 방음 기능을 켜고 다니니까, 길거리에서 인사할 때 아무런 반응이 없어도 너무 개의치 마
|vo_06_01_rm         = Nan pyeongso'e hedeupon bang'eum gineung'eul kkyeogo daninikka, gilgeorieseo insahal ttae amureon baneung'i eopsseodo neomu gaeuichi ma
|vo_06_01_tl         = I usually turn on the soundproof function of my headphone, so don't mind if I have no response when saying hello on the streets.

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・도움
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Helping Each Other
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Helping Each Other.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 넌 생활력이 뛰어난 데다 주변 동료들까지 챙겨 주잖아. 딱히 내가 충고할 건 없어. 물론 너도 내 도움이 필요하지 않을 거고
|vo_06_02_rm         = Neon saenghwallyeogi ttwieonan deda jubyeon dongryodeulkkaji chaenggyeo jujana. Ttakhi naega chunggohal geon eopsseo. Mullon neodo nae doumi piryohaji aneul geogo
|vo_06_02_tl         = You have excellent vitality and you also take care of your colleagues as well. There is not much for me to advise. Of course, you won't need my help too.

<!--Miscellany I-->
|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 풀 원소 「신의 눈」은 연구에 딱히 도움이 되지 않지만, 원소의 힘을 갖게 된 뒤로 사람을 더 세게 때릴 수 있었지. 그래서 그런대로 쓸만한 것 같아
|vo_07_01_rm         = Pul wonso "Sin-ui Nun"eun yeongue ttakkhi doumi doeji anchiman, wonso-ui himeul gakke doen dwiro sarameul deo sege ttaeril su isseojji. Geuraeseo geureondaero sseul manhan geot gata
|vo_07_01_tl         = A Dendro "Vision" doesn't help me much on my research, but I could hit people harder after obtaining elemental powers. So I think it's usable.

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 진리는 누구에게 봉사하기 위해 탄생한 것이 아니야. 인간은 지식의 매개체가 아니고, 지식 역시 인간의 목적이 아니지
|vo_07_02_rm         = Jinrineun nuguege bongsahagi wihae tansaenghan geosi aniya. Inganeun jisik-ui maegaechega anigo, jisik yeoksi ingan-ui mokjeogi aniji
|vo_07_02_tl         = Truth wasn't born to serve someone. Humans are not the medium of knowledge, and knowledge isn't the goal of humans, too.

|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 이 세상에는 사람을 현혹하는 것이 많으니까, 자신의 눈을 너무 믿지 않는 게 좋아. 보이는 것이 다 진실이라면 생각이라는 게 필요 없겠지
|vo_07_03_rm         = I sesang'eneun sarameul hyeonhokhaneun geosi maneunikka, jasin-ui nuneul neomu mijji anneun ge joa. Boineun geosi da jinsiriramyeon saenggagiraneun ge piryo eopgejji
|vo_07_03_tl         = There are many things that lure people, so you shouldn't trust your eyes too much. If everything you see are the truth, there won't be a need to think.

<!--About Others-->
|vo_08_01_title      = 작은 쿠사나리 화신에 대해…
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Lesser Lord Kusanali]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lesser Lord Kusanali.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 신을 지나치게 얕보거나 경외할 필요 없어. 신에겐 신도가 필요하고, 신 또한 먹이사슬의 일부니까. 그래서 난 신을 구하는 일에 동참했다고 자부심을 느끼진 않아. 마찬가지로 작은 쿠사나리 화신도 날 크게 신경 쓰지 않았으면 좋겠어
|vo_08_01_rm         = Sineul jinachige yatbogeona gyeong'oehal piryo eopsseo. Sinegen sindoga piryohago, sin ttohan meogisaseul-ui ilbunikka. Geuraeseo nan sineul guhaneun ire dongchamhaettago jabusimeul neukkijin ana. Machangajiro Jageun Kusanari Hwasindo nal keuge singyeong sseuji anasseumyeon jokesseo
|vo_08_01_tl         = There is no need to excessively look down on a God or gaze in awe. A God needs believers, and a God is also a part of the food chain as well. So I don't feel pride as to the fact that I participated in saving a God. Likewise, I hope Lesser Lord Kusanali doesn't pay attention to me, too.

|vo_08_02_title      = 카베에 대해・배려…
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Kaveh]]: Overly Sensitive
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaveh - Overly Sensitive.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 카베는 남을 지나치게 배려해. 성격이 너무 나약해서 그런가, 호들갑도 심하지
|vo_08_02_rm         = Kabeneun nameul jinachuge baeryeohae. Seonggyeogi neomu nayakhaeseo geureonga, hodeulgapdo simhaji
|vo_08_02_tl         = Kaveh cares for others too much. Maybe because he is too soft, he fusses over things too much.

|vo_08_03_title      = 카베에 대해・사기…
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Kaveh]]: Getting Duped
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaveh - Getting Duped.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 카베는 자칭 자선 판매 노점에서 열쇠고리 열몇 개를 사 왔어. 열쇠고리 매출은 굶주리는 아이를 위해 사용된다나 뭐라나.<br />의료 서비스조차 무료로 제공하는 수메르에서…. 그만 말하자
|vo_08_03_rm         = Kabeneun jaching jaseon panmae nojeomeseo yeolsoegori yeolmyeot gaereul sa wasseo. Yeolsoegori maechureun gumjjurineun aireul wihae sayongdoendana mworana.<br />Uiryo seobiseujocha muryoro jegonghaneun Sumereueseo.... Geuman malhaja
|vo_08_03_tl         = Kaveh bought a few keyrings at a self-styled charity street stall. He said that the sales of the keyrings would be used to children in hunger or whatever.<br />In Sumeru, where even medical services are free... Let's stop talking about this.

|vo_08_04_title      = 타이나리에 대해…
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Tighnari]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Tighnari.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 사람들은 타이나리 성격이 안 좋다고들 하던데, 그건 너무 편협한 생각이야. 예전에 카베가 죽음의 땅에 집을 짓는 바람에 큰 말썽을 일으켰거든. 숲의 순찰대에도 적잖은 폐를 끼쳤지.<br />하지만 그 숲의 순찰관은 카베를 원망하기는커녕, 집에 초대해서 식사까지 대접했어…. 그렇게 착한 사람들이 있으니까 카베가 지금까지 살아남을 수 있었던 거겠지
|vo_08_04_rm         = Saramdeureun Tainari syeonggyeogi an jotdagodeul hadeonde, geugeon neomu pyeonhyeophan saenggagiya. Yejeone Kabega Jugeum-ui Ttang'e jibeul jinneun barame keun malsseong'eul ireukyeokkeodeun. Sup-ui sunchaldae'edo jeokjaneun pyereul kkichyeotjji.<br />Hajiman geu sup-ui sunchalgwaneun Kabereul wonmanghagineun keonyeong, jibe chodaehaeseo siksakkaji daejeophaesseo.... Geureoke chakhan saramdeuri isseunikka Kabega jigeumkkaji saranameul su isseotteon geogejji
|vo_08_04_tl         = People say Tighnari has a bad personality, but that's a narrow thought. A long time ago, Kaveh caused a big trouble because he built a house in The Withering. He caused lots of trouble for the Forest Watchers.<br />But he didn't blame Kaveh, and instead of that, he invited him to his home and offered food... Kaveh must have been able to survive until now thanks to those kind people.

|vo_08_05_title      = 도리에 대해…
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Dori]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Dori.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 영리하고 경각심이 강한 사람이야. 꿈을 현실로 이루어내고, 삶을 잘 꾸려나갈 줄 아는 똑똑한 사람이지. 두둔하려는 건 아냐, 입장이 달라도 삶에 대한 그녀의 태도만큼은 인정해
|vo_08_05_rm         = Yeongrihago gyeonggaksimi ganghan saramiya. Kkumeul hyeonsillo irueonaego, salmeul jal kkuryeonagal jul aneun ttokttokhan saramiji. Dudunharyeoneun geon anya, ipjang'i dallado salme daehan geunyeo-ui taedomaneumeun injeonghae
|vo_08_05_tl         = A clever and alert person. She is a smart person who can make her dream true, and manage her life well. I'm not trying to stand by her, even though we have different opinions, I acknowledge her attitude about life.

|vo_08_06_title      = 사이노에 대해…
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_quest      = The Illusions of the Mob
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Cyno]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Cyno.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 「집단의식」 사건 때문에 풍기관의 업무량이 늘긴 했지만, 근본 원인은 나한테 있는 게 아니니까 양심의 가책을 느끼지는 않아. 사이노도 현명한 사람이라 그 일로 따지러 온 적 없지
|vo_08_06_rm         = "Jipdanuisik" sageon ttaemune punggigwan-ui eommuryang'i neulgin haejjiman, geunbon wonineun nahante inneun ge aninikka yangsim-ui gachageul neukkijineun ana. Sainodo hyeonmyeonghan saramira geu illo ttajireo on jeok eopjji
|vo_08_06_tl         = Because of the "Group Consciousness" case, the workload of the Matra did increase, but I do not feel the pang of conscience since the root reason isn't me. Cyno is a wise person, so he didn't come to quibble over that.

|vo_08_07_title      = 닐루에 대해…
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Nilou]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Nilou.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 예술가는 장단점이 뚜렷한 직업이야. 닐루는 장점을 아주 잘 살려서 단순하면서도 행복한 삶을 살고 있지
|vo_08_07_rm         = Yesulganeun jangdanjeomi tturyeothan jigeobiya. Nilluneun jangjeomeul aju jal sallyeoseo dansunhamyeonseodo haengbokhan salmeul salgo ijji
|vo_08_07_tl         = An artist is a job that has clear advantages and disadvantages. Nilou played to her strengths, so she has a simple and happy life.

|vo_08_08_title      = 데히야에 대해…
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Dehya]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Dehya.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 데히야가 도금 여단에 있는 건 재능 낭비야. 내 제안을 받고 아카데미아에 오면 우리 업무도 훨씬 편해질 텐데. 물론 안정적인 삶에 흥미를 느끼지 못하는 마음은 이해가 가. 어찌 됐든 아쉽게 됐어
|vo_08_08_rm         = Dehiyaga dogeum yeodane inneun geon jaeneung nangbiya. Nae jeaneul bakko Akademia'e omyeon uri eommudo hwolssin pyeonhaejil tende. Mullon anjeongjeogin salme heungmireul neukkiji mothaneun maeumeun ihaega ga. Eojji dwaetdeun aswipge dwaesseo
|vo_08_08_tl         = It is a waste of gift for Dehya to stay in the Eremites. Our work would be much easier of she comes to the Akademiya by accepting my suggestions. Of course, I can understand her not being interested in a stable life. Anyhow, it is a shame.

<!--More About-->
|vo_09_01_title      = 알하이탐에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 대부분 사람들은 내게 자발적으로 다가오지 않아. 날 두려워하는 걸 수도, 성격이 안 맞는 걸 수도 있겠지. 어쨌든 난 이런 상황에 정말 만족해
|vo_09_01_rm         = Daebubun saramdeureun naege jabaljeogeuro dagaoji ana. Nal duryeowohaneun geol sudo, seonggyeogi an manneun geol sudo ikkejji. Eojjaetteun nan ireon sanghwang'e jeongmal manjokhae
|vo_09_01_tl         = Most people don't reach me by their own will. They might be scared of me, or our personalities just don't go well together. Anyways, I am satisfied at this kind of situation.

|vo_09_02_title      = 알하이탐에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 사교에는 전혀 관심 없어. 너도 알다시피 난 대부분 사람들보다 편안하게 지내고 있지. 사교가 삶의 필수가 아니라는 사실이 증명된 셈이야
|vo_09_02_rm         = Sagyo'eneun jeonhyeo gwansim eopsseo. Neodo aldasipi nan daebubun saramdeulboda pyeonanhage jinaego ijji. Sagyoga salmui pilsuga aniraneun sasiri jeungmyeongdoen semiya
|vo_09_02_tl         = I'm not interested in society at all. As you know, I live more comfortably than most people. The fact that society is not necessary in life has been proved.

|vo_09_03_title      = 알하이탐에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 사람은 자기주장을 견지하면서 깨어있어야 해. 안 그러면 이런저런 돌발상황이 발생할 때 휩쓸리거나 그릇된 길에 빠질 수 있지
|vo_09_03_rm         = Sarameun jagijujang'eul gyeonjihamyeonseo kkaeeoisseoya hae. An geureomyeon ireonjeoreon dolbalsanghwang'i balsaenghal ttae hwipsseulligeona geureutdoen gire ppajil su ijji
|vo_09_03_tl         = People should be awake while adhereing their own opinion. Or else, they could be swept or gone to the wrong way when outbreak situations happen.

|vo_09_04_title      = 알하이탐에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 질서가 무너지는 순간 여파는 신속하게 퍼지기 마련이지. 난 그런 상황이 싫어. 지금의 삶을 방해하잖아
|vo_09_04_rm         = Jilseoga muneojineun sungan yeopaneun sinsokhage peojigi maryeoniji. Nan geureon sanghwang'i sireo. Jigeum-ui salmeul banghaehajana
|vo_09_04_tl         = The moment order breaks down, aftereffects are fastly spread. I hate those kinds of circumstances. It bothers my current life.

|vo_09_05_title      = 알하이탐에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 퇴근하면 종종 술집에 들러 한잔하는 편이야.<br />그런 걸 알고 싶은 게 아니라고? 음, 난 여가를 공유하는 게 개인 관점을 공유하는 것보다 더 사적인 일이라고 생각하는데. 관점은 누구든 게시판에 당당하게 적고 다니잖아
|vo_09_05_rm         = Toegeunhamyeon jongjong suljibe deulleo hanjanhaneun pyeoniya.<br />Geureon geol algo sipeun ge anirago? Eum, nan yeogareul gong'yuhaneun ge gaein gwanjeomeul gong'yuhaneun geotboda deo sajeogin irirago saenggakhaneunde. Gwanjeomeun nugudeun gesipane dangdanghage jeokkko danijana
|vo_09_05_tl         = I often have a drink by visiting the bar after work.<br />You don't want to know that? Hmm, I thought sharing my leisures is more private than sharing my personal perspective. Everyone writes their own perspectives on the bulletin boards.

<!--Miscellany II-->
|vo_10_01_title      = 알하이탐의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 난해한 책을 읽으면서 골치 아파하는 사람을 구경하는 게 내 취미지.<br />농담이야. 난 타인의 고통으로 즐거움을 느끼지도 않을뿐더러, 내게 난해한 책이란 거의 없거든
|vo_10_01_rm         = Nanhaehan chaegeul ilgeumyeonseo golchi apahaneun sarameul gugyeonghaneun ge nae chwimiji.<br />Nongdamiya. Nan tain-ui gotong'euro jeulgeoumeun neukkijido aneulppundeoreo, naege nanhaehan chaegiral geoui eopkkeodeun
|vo_10_01_tl         = It is my hobby to look at a person being annoyed by a hard book.<br />It's a joke. I don't feel happiness from others' pain, and there is no such hard book to me.

|vo_10_02_title      = 알하이탐의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 내 관찰에 따르면, 고민은 대부분 자초한 거야. 살면서 수많은 고민이 쌓일 텐데 스스로 더 추가할 필요는 없지
|vo_10_02_rm         = Nae gwanchare ttareumyeon, gomineun daebubun jachohan geoya. Salmyeonseo sumaneun gomini ssail tende seuseuro deo chugahal piryoneun eopjji
|vo_10_02_tl         = According to my observations, troubles are mostly self-inflicted. There would be many troubles in your life, and there is no need to add them yourself.

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 외형보단 맛이 중요하지. 간단한 요구잖아? 본말이 전도돼서는 안 돼
|vo_10_03_rm         = Oehyeongbodan masi jung'yohaji. Gandanhan yogujana? Bonmarijeondodwaeseoneun an dwae
|vo_10_03_tl         = Taste is important than shape. It's a simple request, no? The cart shouldn't be put before the horse.

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 수프나 국물이 있는 요리는 독서하면서 먹기 힘들어
|vo_10_04_rm         = Supeuna gukmuri inneun yorineun dokseohamyeonseo meokki himdeureo
|vo_10_04_tl         = Food with soup is hard to eat while reading.

<!--Receiving a Gift-->
|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 음, 조미료 배합 비율이 완벽하군
|vo_11_01_rm         = Eum, jomiryo baehap biyuri wanbyeokhagun
|vo_11_01_tl         = Hmm, the seasoning mix ratio is perfect.

|vo_11_02_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 요즘 유행하는 맛이야. 나쁘지는 않군
|vo_11_02_rm         = Yojeun yuhaenghaneun masiya. Nappeujineun ankun
|vo_11_02_tl         = It's a popular taste. Not bad.

|vo_11_03_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 여기서 먹고 싶지는 않은데, 포장해 가도 될까?
|vo_11_03_rm         = Yeogiseo meokko sipjjineun aneunde, pojanghae gado doelkka?
|vo_11_03_tl         = I don't want to eat it here, can I take out?

<!--Birthday-->
|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 생일 축하해. 난 사람들이 생일에 너무 과한 열정을 쏟아붓고 있다고 생각해. 그 열정을 일상에 나눠서 사용하는 게 더 합리적일 텐데. 그 점에 있어서 넌 합격이야.<br />선물로 뭘 줄지 모르겠으니, 신청서 1회 프리패스 특권을 줄게
|vo_12_01_rm         = Saeng'il chukhahae. Nan saramdeuri saeng'ire neomu gwahan yeoljeong'eul ssodabukko ittago saenggakhae. Geu yeoljeong'eul ilsang'e nanwoseo sayonghaneun ge deo haprijeogil tende. Geu jeome isseoseo neon hapgyeogiya.<br />Seonmullo mwol julji moreugesseuni, sincheongseo ilhoe peuripaeseo teukkwoneul julkke
|vo_12_01_tl         = Happy birthday. I think people pour too much passion into birthdays. It would be more rational to use that passion in daily life. It's a pass for you in that matter.<br />I don't know what to give as a present, so I'll give you a one-time application form free pass privilege.

<!--Feelings About Ascension-->
|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 고마워
|vo_13_01_rm         = Gomawo
|vo_13_01_tl         = Thank you.

|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 일회성이 아니었군
|vo_13_02_rm         = Ilhoeseong'i anieokkun
|vo_13_02_tl         = It wasn't an one-time thing.

|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 내가 강해졌는데, 어째 네가 더 기뻐하고 있군
|vo_13_03_rm         = Naega ganghaejyeonneunde, eojjae nega deo gippeohago ikkun
|vo_13_03_tl         = I became stronger, but somehow you seem happier.

|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 아카데미아의 게으른 녀석들한테 내가 발전하고 있다는 걸 들키면 안 돼. 녀석들이 알게 된다면 갖은 수단을 써서 성가신 일을 나한테 떠넘길 거야. 물론, 들어주지 않겠지만 요청을 받는 것만으로도 시간 낭비니까
|vo_13_04_rm         = Akademia-ui geeureun nyeoseokdeulhante naega baljeonhago ittaneun geol deulkimyeon an dwae. Nyeoseokdeuri alge doendamyeon gajeun sudaneul sseoseo seonggasin ireul nahante tteoneomgil geoya. Mullon, deureojuji ankejjiman yocheong'eul banneun geotmaneurodo sigan nangbinikka
|vo_13_04_tl         = I shouldn't let the lazy ones in the Akademiya know that I'm getting stronger. If they know, they will use various methods to make me do annoying work. Of course, I won't listen to them, but getting a request itself is a waste of time.
}}
